summary: Implemented uniform artifact naming scheme for team workflows. All intermediate artifacts now include run numbers (e.g., research-001-teammate-a-findings.md) to correlate with their synthesized outputs. Updated 6 files in .claude/ directory.

artifacts.summary: Implementation summary with all phase completions and verification results

completion_data.completion_summary: Standardized artifact naming across team workflows by adding run-scoped prefixes to all intermediate artifacts (teammate findings, candidate plans, phase results, debug reports). Updated artifact-formats.md documentation and all three team skills.
completion_data.claudemd_suggestions: Added Team Artifacts section to artifact-formats.md, updated skill-team-research/plan/implement with run number calculation and paths, updated team-wave-helpers.md templates, updated team-metadata-extension.md examples

next_steps: Review implementation and run /todo to archive task
